com.sitewhere.spi.search.external

Interface IDeviceEventSearchProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILifecycleComponent, ISearchProvider

    public interface IDeviceEventSearchProvider
extends ISearchProvider
    Search provider that provides information about SiteWhere device events.

    • Method Summary
